data.text: @Rick_Bayless I so want to help you guys.  But you capitulated to authoritarian values.  You discriminated against an entire class of people for simply making a personal medical decision.  You reap what you sow.

... incurred debt and slowly returning business. Together, let's make sure they can continue to serve and enliven our communities.  Here's super-easy, one-click message to reach your lawmakers 👉 https://t.co/VvpDJossOg
